purpleculture_pinyin:
liǎng
two; both; some; a few; tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤 (old)
два; обе; немного; немного; таэль, единица веса, равная 50 граммам (современные) или 1⁄16 катти 斤 (старые)

heisig_chinese_memo: A yoke (carrying device), allows you to carry two (dos) things on your shoulders at the same time. After someone enters stuff into the buckets on each side of the yoke, you'll be surprised how much you can carry.
Ru_trainchinese:

liǎng: (сч.слово) пятьдесят грамм
Kanshudo_mnemonic: with one turban (帀) you can enter (入) both
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: We can see dos (Spanish for 'two') people wrapped in a belt.
humanum_full_description_en:
" Two " inscriptions made "㒳", or add a horizontal line to "㒳" to increase the complexity of the pen. " Two " the word is the interception of ancient writing " car " part of the word configuration is made, like the front cowl part Heng Department (driving apparatus around the neck of the animal while Mara things) the shape (see Seigo) to double E. In the Bronze Inscriptions of the Warring States Period, the word " two " is written as " sheep " in the middle, and it is pronounced as sheep.

Bronze inscriptions are used as a quantitative word to indicate two. The xiaochen zhaigui: "Yi (gives) two golden carts and two horses." Also used as a unit of weight.

"Said Wen": "Twenty-four baht is one or two. From one, 㒳, split equally, also sound."
humanum_short_description_en: " Two " inscriptions made of "㒳", or add a horizontal line to "㒳" to increase the complexity of the pen. " Two " the word is the interception of ancient writing " car " part of the word configuration is made, like the front cowl part Heng Department (driving apparatus around the neck of the animal while Mara things) the shape (see Seigo) to double E. Under the guise of two, weight units, etc.
humanum_full_description:
「兩」金文作「㒳」，或於「㒳」上添一橫，為增繁飾筆。「兩」字是截取古文字「車」字的部分構形而成，象車轅前部衡上繫以雙軶(牛馬拉東西時駕在脖子上的器具)之形(參于省吾)。戰國金文「兩」字中間寫作「羊」，以羊標聲。

　　金文用作數量詞，表示兩個，小臣宅簋：「易(賜)金車、馬兩。」又用作重量單位，平宫鼎：「十三兩十七斤。」

　　《說文》：「二十四銖爲一兩。从一，㒳，平分，亦聲。」
humanum_short_description: 「兩」金文作「㒳」，或於「㒳」上添一橫，為增繁飾筆。「兩」字是截取古文字「車」字的部分構形而成，象車轅前部衡上繫以雙軶(牛馬拉東西時駕在脖子上的器具)之形(參于省吾)。假借為兩個、重量單位等。

①數目，二。一般用於量詞和“個、半、千、萬、億”前：兩個黃鸝。兩本書。
②雙方：兩可。兩邊。兩便(客套用語，彼此方便)。兩旁。兩側。兩袖清風。兩敗俱傷。
③中國市制重量單位：十兩(一市斤。舊制爲十六兩一市斤)。半斤八兩(喻彼此一樣，不相上下，含貶義)。
④表示不定數目：兩下子。兩着兒(zh乷r)。

「 兩 」金文作「 㒳 」，或於「 㒳 」上添一橫，為增繁飾筆。「 兩 」字是截取古文字「 車 」字的部分構形而成，象車轅前部衡上繫以雙軶(牛馬拉東西時駕在脖子上的器具)之形(參于省吾)。戰國金文「 兩 」字中間寫作「 羊 」，以羊標聲。 金文用作數量詞，表示兩個，小臣宅簋：「易(賜)金車、馬兩。」又用作重量單位，平宫鼎：「十三兩十七斤。」 《說文》：「二十四銖爲一兩。从一，㒳，平分，亦聲。」
" Two" inscriptions made " 㒳", or add a horizontal line to " 㒳" to increase the complexity of the pen. " Two" the word is the interception of ancient writing " car" part of the word configuration is made, like the front cowl part Heng Department (driving apparatus around the neck of the animal while Mara things) the shape (see Seigo) to double E. In the Bronze Inscriptions of the Warring States Period, the word " two" is written as " sheep" in the middle, and it is pronounced as sheep. Bronze inscriptions are used as a quantitative word to indicate two. The xiaochen zhaigui: "Yi (gives) two golden carts and two horses." Also used as a unit of weight. "Said Wen": "Twenty-four baht is one or two. From one, 㒳, split equally, also sound."

兩字的基本解释

兩
liǎng
见“两”。

兩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liǎng］
［《廣韻》良奬切，上養，來。］
亦作“両1”。“两1”的繁体字。
(1)数词。二。常用于成对的人或事物以及同时出现的双方。
(2)表示不定数，多与'一'或'三'前后连用，义为少量。
(3)两个人或两件事物。
(4)指对立的两面或两个极端。
(5)指联系、协调双方的人或事物。
(6)加倍；翻一番。
(7)两次；两度。
(8)同时兼具两方面。
(9)等同；比并。
(10)犹言分散不统一。
(11)整治，修饰。
(12)重量单位。古制二十四铢为一两，十六两为一斤。今市制折合国际单位制0.05千克，十钱一两，十两一斤。
(13)量词。用于鞋、袜等成对使用的衣物。
(14)量词。用于两股相交的物品。
(15)量词。犹匹。用于帛、锦。每两四丈。
(16)古代军队编制单位。二十五人为一两。
(17)通“魎”。
[②]［liàng］
［《廣韻》力讓切，去漾，來。］
亦作“両2”。“两2”的繁体字。“輛1”的古字。
(1)量词。用于车辆。

兩字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【入字部】　兩； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页126第13
〔古文〕㒳【唐韻】【正韻】良獎切【集韻】【韻會】里養切，?良上聲。【說文】再也。【易·繫辭】兼三才而兩之。又【玉篇】匹耦也。【周禮·天官·大宰之職】以九兩繫邦國之民。【註】兩猶耦也，所以協耦萬民，聯繫不散，有九事也。又【韻會】匹也。【左傳·閔二年】重錦三十兩。【註】三十匹也。又車數曰兩。【後漢·吳祐傳】載之兼兩。【註】車有兩輪，故稱兩。又【玉篇】二十四銖爲兩。又【雞林類事】四十曰麻兩。又【史記·平準書】更鑄四銖錢，其文爲半兩。又【南史·齊和帝紀】百姓及朝士皆以方帛塡胸，名曰假兩。又【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】力讓切【正韻】力仗切，?良去聲【詩·召南】百兩御之。

暂无。

Two
Basic explanation of words
Two
liǎng
See "two".
Two
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liǎng］
["Guangyun" good prize cut, raise, come. ]
Also known as "Tain 1". "Two 1" in traditional characters.
(1) Numerals. two. Often used in pairs of people or things and both parties appearing at the same time.
(2) It means an indefinite number, which is often used in conjunction with'one' or'three', meaning a small amount.
(3) Two people or two things.
(4) Refers to two opposite sides or two extremes.
(5) Refers to the person or thing that contacts and coordinates both parties.
(6) Double; double.
(7) Twice; two degrees.
(8) It has both aspects at the same time.
(9) Equal; compare and merge.
(10) It is still said to be scattered and not unified.
(11) Remediation and modification.
(12) Weight unit. In the ancient system, twenty-four baht is one tael, and 16 tael is one catty. Today's city system is equivalent to 0.05 kilograms in the International System of Units, which is one tael for ten dollars and one kilogram for twelve dollars.
(13) Quantifiers. Used in pairs of clothing such as shoes and socks.
(14) Quantifiers. Used for items where two strands intersect.
(15) Quantifiers. Yuppy. Used in silk and brocade. Every two or four feet.
(16) Ancient army establishment unit. Twenty-five people are one or two.
(17) Through "魉".
[②]［liàng］
["Guangyun" force to cut, go to Yang, come. ]
Also known as "Feng 2". "Two 2" in traditional characters. The ancient character of "vehicle 1".
(1) Quantifiers. Used in vehicles.
Two
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Into the word department] 　liang; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 126-13
〔古文〕㒳【Tang Yun】【Zheng Yun】Good prize cut 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme meeting】Keep cut, good sound. [Said the text] Never again. [Yi·Ci] Combine three talents and two. Also 【Jade articles】Coupling. [Position of Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Da Zhai】The people of the state are based on nine. [Note] The two are still coupled, so there are nine things in co-coupling the people, and the connection is not broken. Also 【Rhyme Club】Pie also. [Zuo Zhuan·Min 2nd Year] Thirty two heavy brocades. [Note] Thirty horses are also available. There are two more cars. [Later Han·Wu You Biography] Two sets of both. [Note] The car has two wheels, so it is called two. Also [Jade articles] Twenty-four baht is two. Also 【Jilin-like things】Forty-forty said numbness. In addition, [Historical Records·Leveling Book] made four baht coins, and the text was half a tael. Also [Southern History·Qihe Emperor Ji] The common people and dynasties all used square silk as their breasts, and their names were fake two. And [Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Forced to cut [Zheng Yun] force to cut,? Liang Qusheng [Poetry·Zhaonan] One hundred two imperial.
